description: Complete system overview detailing the infrastructure as code generation architecture, plugin system, and core deployment orchestration components
Detailed documentation of the code generation algorithms, including template processing, resource definition conversion, and provider-specific code generation logic
Comprehensive documentation of cloud resource data models, validation rules, and relationships between different resource types across providers
Documentation of data flow between core components including code generation, plugin registry, and deployment orchestration services
Detailed specification of the plugin architecture, including provider registration, resource type management, and extension points
